headline: I'm Ismael Hadj
intro: I'm a Seoul based IT engineer, creating awesome and effective websites and mobile applications for companies. Let's start scrolling and learn more about me.
aboutContent: Hi! I'm Ismael Hadj, an IT engineer living in Seoul, South Korea. I have a passion for web development and mobile application. I have a strong background in web development and mobile application development. I am always eager to learn new technologies and look for new challenges. I am a fast learner and can work under pressure. I am a team player and can also work independently.
educationDegree1: Master and bachelor degree in computer science
educationDetails1: Master and bachelor degree where I majored in computer science with specialization in web and mobile application development
highSchoolDetails: Studied in IT class. Obtained degree with special mention.
work2Title: React/Flutter/Java Spring boot developer in Seoul
work2Details: Working on social network mobile app and its admin website using Flutter, React, and Java Spring Boot. In charge of the admin website and its architecture.
work3Details: Worked on a website for a company in Seoul, Korea.
work4Details: Creation of websites for customers based in France using Wordpress, PHP with Symfony, Angular, etc.
work5Details: Worked on the official website of the Marseille metropolis with the Symfony framework.
work6Details: Worked on a software edited by Microsoft for large companies. Responsible for maintenance and creating new functionality.
work7Details: Created a framework for a new expense report software.
work1Details: As a Web Developer, I have autonomously managed complex front-end API projects and developed metaverse environments. I have extensive experience with video call systems using native WebRTC and modifying Jitsi Meet. My work consistently enhances project outcomes and user experiences.
skillsDetails: While working on different projects, I have acquired a lot of skills in various fields. Here is a list of the most important ones. Of course, I am always learning new things and am open to new challenges.
portfolioTitle: Check Out Some of My Works.
portfolio5: Notice list in application admin website
portfolio6: Notice form in application admin website
portfolio7: List of product which should be send on admin website
portfolio8: List of product available in the app
testimonial1: 추천대상자는 사내의 신규 사업인 아임펫폼폼의 프론트 개발자로서 앱과 됩의 개발을 성실히 담당하였습니 다. 화면 설계와 디자이너가 배정되지 않은 상태에서도 능동적으로 프로젝트를 선 진행하여 차질없이 업무 를 완수하였으며 수정 요구사항에 대해서도 긍정적이며 빠른 피드백으로 문제를 해결했습니다. 또한 한국어 의사소통을 위해서 꾸준하게 학습하는 노력을 보이며 한국 생활에 적용하고 있습니다. 하지만 개인의 의사와 상관없이 회사 내부적인 상황으로 부득이하게 신규 서비스 종료가 결정되어 귀사에 이스마열 대리의 채용을 추천 드립니다.
